mapper.select: select event , year , month , day , remarks from tbl_timeline order by order_no asc
select type , name , remarks from tbl_license order by order_no asc
select intro , marker , preserve , delay from tbl_intro order by uid desc limit 1

select a.uid as uid , a.title as title , a.language as language , b.convert_name as convert_name , b.ext as ext , (select program_layout from tbl_setting order by uid desc limit 1) as program_layout from tbl_program as a left join tbl_program_img_storage as b on a.uid = b.fid group by a.uid order by a.order_no asc

select a.title as title , a.language as language , a.skill as skill , date_format(a.start_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as start_date , date_format(a.end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as end_date , b.convert_name as convert_name , b.ext as ext , b.remarks as remarks from tbl_program as a left join tbl_program_img_storage as b on a.uid = b.fid where fid = #{ uid } order by a.order_no asc
select name , ability , background_color , font_color from tbl_skill order by ability desc
select icon , year , contents , (select shape from tbl_icon where uid = a.icon) as shape from tbl_activity as a order by order_no asc
